attributes.action: Prevent the rise of racism in Britain
attributes.background:
The recent referendum has led to alarming levels of racist abuse and attacks. Buoyed by the vote to exit the EU, racist people think that their voice has been legitimised.

I request that the rag-tag bunch of whoever is left in the Houses of Parliament move quickly and decisively to prevent this.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to prevent the rise of racism.
